title: Accor plans to double PME room count in India in next three years
description: Accor plans to double its room count in India in the next three years in the PME segments. The growth is driven by factors like growing outbound Indian travelers in Asia and the booming middle class in India.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
